text: Jigme Singye Wangchuck is the former king of Bhutan. He abdicated his throne in favour of his son, His Majesty the King Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck in 2006. == References == Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:Monarchs of Bhutan Category:Buddhists
title: Jigme Singye Wangchuck
